name: Classic Magazine
description: A typography-first theme inspired by traditional print media. Features a sophisticated mix of serif and sans-serif fonts, strict 0px radius, and high-contrast borders.

card.article: bg-white border-b border-neutral-200 pb-6 mb-6 hover:opacity-80 transition-opacity cursor-pointer
card.compact: flex gap-4 items-start border-b border-neutral-100 pb-4 mb-4

button.primary: bg-black text-white h-12 px-8 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-neutral-800 transition-colors rounded-none
button.secondary: bg-white text-black border border-black h-12 px-8 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-neutral-50 transition-colors rounded-none
button.ghost: text-neutral-900 hover:text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-[10px]

input.search: w-full border-b border-neutral-300 py-3 text-lg font-serif placeholder:font-sans placeholder:text-neutral-400 focus:outline-none focus:border-black transition-colors bg-transparent

typography.h1: font-serif text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold leading-tight tracking-tight text-neutral-900
typography.h2: font-serif text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold leading-tight text-neutral-900
typography.h3: font-sans text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-neutral-900 mb-2
typography.caption: font-sans text-xs text-neutral-500 uppercase tracking-wider
